spec_data.Name: roundcubemail
spec_data.License: GPLv3+ with exceptions and GPLv3+ and GPLv2 and LGPLv2+ and CC-BY-SA and (MIT or GPLv2)
spec_data.Description:
RoundCube Webmail is a browser-based multilingual IMAP client
with an application-like user interface. It provides full
functionality you expect from an e-mail client, including MIME
support, address book, folder manipulation, message searching
and spell checking. RoundCube Webmail is written in PHP and
requires a database: MySQL, PostgreSQL and SQLite are known to
work. The user interface is fully skinnable using XHTML and
CSS 2.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 05 Sep 2017 01:42:21 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Round Cube Webmail is a browser-based multilingual IMAP client
